title: Do I need a good laptop from the 1st sem itself?
content:
I need to buy a laptop, thinking about getting either a macbook air / pro or a higher end windows laptop, partitioning the hard drive and installing linux. I thought it would be smarter to buy one after 1 or 2 sems so that I know exactly what I need, but for now I'm using a very basic HP laptop (30k one, with an i3 processor). Will that be enough for the first 2 sems?

PS: my branch is cse and I'm not interested in gaming on my laptop

comments.body: Sure it wud suffice fr 1st 2sems nd can look forward after 2n sem....

If you want to do computer vision related things in the first year itself, then you'd need a decent GPU, otherwise you could wait it out

Install Linux mint or something on your current laptop if you want, it'll breathe life into your machine
